title: Redragon K617 Fizz 60% Wired RGB Gaming Keyboard, 61 Keys Compact Mechanical Keyboard w/White and Grey Color Keycaps, Linear Red Switch, Pro Driver/Software Supported
descriptions:
Introducing the Redragon K617 Fizz 60% Wired RGB Gaming Keyboard! This compact mechanical keyboard is a must-have for FPS gamers who demand precision and performance. With 61 keys, white and grey color keycaps, and Linear Red switches, this keyboard is built for speed and accuracy.

The RGB lighting features 20 presets, adjustable brightness, and customizable speed, allowing you to create the perfect gaming atmosphere. The hot-swappable switches have a lifespan of 50 million keypresses, ensuring durability and longevity.

With pro driver/software support, you can customize your keyboard with design modes, effects, macros, keybindings, and shortcuts. The compact design and optimized mouse space make this keyboard ideal for efficient workspace management.

Don't settle for anything less than the best - upgrade to the Redragon K617 Fizz and take your gaming experience to the next level!

Equipped with Linear Red switches for smooth and quiet mechanical performance, this keyboard offers a lifespan of up to 50 million keypresses. The RGB lighting features 20 presets that are fully customizable, allowing you to set the perfect ambiance for your gaming experience.

The Redragon K617 Fizz is supported by pro driver software, giving you the ability to customize keybindings, create macros, and set shortcuts for a personalized gaming experience. With a dedicated space optimized for your mouse, this keyboard is designed to enhance your efficiency and performance.
